content.caption:
✨ Ready to elevate your daily grind? Check out my latest video for some simple yet powerful lifestyle hacks that can boost your productivity and well-being! 🌟 Whether you’re working from home or hitting the office, these tips are designed for YOU. Let’s thrive together! 💪💼 

👉 Drop a comment with your go-to productivity tip and share this with someone who needs a little extra motivation! 📲 #LifestyleHacks #WorkLifeBalance

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

content.media_prompt: A lifestyle social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: ✨ Ready to elevate your daily grind? Check out my latest video for some simple yet powerful lifestyl, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
